metadata.title: CVE-2019-10191 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was discovered in DNS resolver of knot resolver before version 4.1.0 which allows remote attackers to downgrade DNSSEC-secure domains to DNSSEC-insecure state, opening possibility of domain hijack using attacks against insecure DNS protocol.

notes.note: amurray> According to the upstream advisory all version <= 4.0.0 are affected

criterions.comment: knot-resolver package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
